about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a meditative strategy game where you create and develop your dragon islands without timers or stress. Create breathtaking landscapes and watch as the inhabitants care for their toothy pets. It's the perfect game for both relaxation and creativity.

Simple Island design and customisation


Easily create beautiful islands with a few simple tools. Customise the environment to suit your own personal tastes. Create your perfect dragon paradise. No hassle needed!

Create a growing community for your Dragons


Build a growing settlement and immerse yourself in its magical world. Watch as residents lovingly raise their toothy pets and transform your island into a vibrant, thriving community. With every new home and every act of care for the dragons, the island comes alive with warmth and charm.

Build and personalize neighborhood homes


Your dragons will live with people who will help you raise them. Build a cosy settlement for them.

  • Move, rotate and resize the houses.
  • Place windows and doors however you like!
  • Change colors and materials.
